channel.title: Out of Oblivion - Articles
channel.description: Random thoughts and findings of a novice coder.

item.title: Installing Arch Linux on Raspberry Pi 3 Model B
item.description: Today I installed Arch Linux on my Raspberry Pi. The Arch Linux guide is sufficiant and I followed it mostly overcoming few small hiccups which I plan on documenting here.

item.title: Blog of Blogs
item.description: Here I plan to keep links of exciting blog posts which I encounter. I will go on updating the list regularly.

item.title: Working with submodules in Android Studio and git
item.description: I encountered working with submodules in Android Studio a while back while I was integrating GIS features with our PDM app. Apparently it looked like a simple task, and truth be told it was, I did face a few hiccups getting there. The following will be a documentation of the procedure I followed while I integrated NextGis Android App with our very own college project.
